function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Link between national outbreak of COVID-19 and air travel in Ireland","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through air travel","Mitigation":"Implement strict health screening measures at airports, enforce quarantine protocols for travelers from high-risk areas","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, quarantine monitoring systems","People":"Travelers, airport staff, local residents","Owner":"Health departments, airport authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of data on actual transport demand","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess transportation-related disease spread and plan effective interventions","Mitigation":"Collect and analyze data on actual transportation demand, conduct surveys to understand travel patterns and behavior","Technologies":"Big data analytics, transportation surveys, mobile app usage data","People":"Transportation authorities, public health agencies, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, transportation companies"},{"Description":"Use of population flow data captured via mobile phone cellular signaling","Impact":"Privacy concerns related to the collection and use of personal mobile phone data","Mitigation":"Anonymize and aggregate the data to protect privacy, obtain informed consent from data subjects, comply with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, encryption, consent management platforms","People":"Mobile phone users, data subjects, data analysts, regulators","Owner":"Data management companies, data analysts, regulatory authorities"}]}
